entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
